import { CodeComponent } from '@/pages/components/code.component'
import DocsLayout from '@/layouts/docs.layout'
import ComponentLayout from '@/layouts/component.layout'
import { Text, Video } from '@fold-dev/core'
import React from 'react'

export const docs = {
    title: 'Video',
    subtitle: 'The Video compoment is used to incorporate a video from single or mutliple sources.',
    description:
        'The Video component is used to incorporate video content within a document, encompassing items like movie clips or other video streams.',
}

export const props = []

export const css = [[["--f-video-border-radius","var(--f-radius)"],["--f-video-background-color","var(--f-color-surface-strong)"]]]

```tsx
import {} from "@fold-dev/core";
```

### Default

export const Default = () => (<Video loader muted controls width={500} height={250} poster="/video.jpg" srcs={[
        {
            src: 'https://ia800300.us.archive.org/17/items/BigBuckBunny_124/Content/big_buck_bunny_720p_surround.mp4',
            type: 'video/ogg',
        },
    ]}/>);

<div className="story-block">
<Default />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Default.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Default = () => (
    <Video
        loader
        muted
        controls
        width={500}
        height={250}
        poster="/video.jpg"
        srcs={[
            {
                src: 'https://ia800300.us.archive.org/17/items/BigBuckBunny_124/Content/big_buck_bunny_720p_surround.mp4',
                type: 'video/ogg',
            },
        ]}
    />
)
```
### Failed To Load Video

export const FailedToLoadVideo = () => (<Video loader muted controls width={500} height={250} errorContent={<Text color="white">We could not locate the video!</Text>} poster="" srcs={[
        {
            src: 'nothing-here',
            type: 'video/ogg',
        },
    ]}/>);

<div className="story-block">
<FailedToLoadVideo />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="FailedToLoadVideo.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const FailedToLoadVideo = () => (
    <Video
        loader
        muted
        controls
        width={500}
        height={250}
        errorContent={<Text color="white">We could not locate the video!</Text>}
        poster=""
        srcs={[
            {
                src: 'nothing-here',
                type: 'video/ogg',
            },
        ]}
    />
)
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
